Retrieve text data from company websites for classification. These steps collectively contribute to a comprehensive framework for classifying companies based on the content of their websites, incorporating web scraping, NLP, machine learning, and visualization techniques.

his repository contains a research project focused on forecasting Bitcoin (BTCUSD) prices using the ARIMA (AutoRegressive Integrated Moving Average) model within a machine learning framework. The project explores the challenges of cryptocurrency volatility and demonstrates how ARIMA can be applied to timeseries data for financial forecasting.
A pipeline framework for developing video and image processing application. Supports multiple GPUs and Machine Learning tooklits

This repository presents an interactive data preprocessing and incremental learning framework for structured datasets. The system automates essential data cleaning operations, including missing value handling, outlier capping, duplicate removal, feature encoding, and scaling to prepare data for machine learning tasks.

Application Deployment and Description  To deploy the application, I used Streamlit, a Python-based framework designed for rapid development of interactive data science and machine learning applications. Streamlit allows users to input data through a web interface and obtain real-time predictions along with explanations.
Exploratory computational framework for protein sequence modeling and folding analysis using machine learning and simulations.
Folax (Finite Operator Learning with JAX) is a framework for solving and optimizing PDEs by integrating machine learning with numerical methods in computational mechanics.

UniML, as the name suggests, is a unified command-line interface(CLI)  system made for training, testing and deploying multiple machine learning models across various domains.  etc in a diverse framework emphasizing on reproducibility and cross-modal integration.
In Silico Prediction of Shelf-Life for Marinated Meat Products Using an Integrative Framework of Machine Learning and Text Mining

HackGPT Enterprise is a production-ready, cloud-native AI-powered penetration testing platform designed for enterprise security teams. It combines advanced AI, machine learning, microservices architecture, and comprehensive security frameworks to deliver professional-grade cybersecurity assessments.
A framework to serve various generative AIs and other machine learning functions via WebSocket and JSONRPC.

A comprehensive checkpoint management and experiment tracking system for machine learning models. Intelligent model checkpointing with automated experiment tracking, performance analytics, and training resumption. Built for production ML workflows with support    for PyTorch, TensorFlow, JAX, and custom model frameworks.
An AI based Smart Waste Classification System built on top of Python's Web Framework Django with several Web Technologies  with additional techs of Machine Learning models

A data-driven approach to discovering inorganic perovskite gas sensing materials using machine learning and first-principles descriptors. The framework predicts adsorption energy, gassurface interactions and sensing performance toward NH, NO, NO, HS, and SO to enable efficient and selective gas sensor design.
A flexible machine & deep learning framework built from scratch using only NumPy

An AI-driven monitoring dashboard combining Machine Learning models and an AI agent to analyze sensor data, identify anomalies, and provide actionable recommendations. Backend powered by Django REST Framework, frontend built with React + Vite.
An inference server for your machine learning models, including support for multiple frameworks, multi-model serving and more
Repo for MORE-Q(X) dataset and MORE-ML machine learning framework
A comprehensive portfolio optimization framework implementing multiple optimization techniques including genetic algorithms, mean-variance optimization, risk parity, and machine learning approaches.

Explainable machine learning framework for detecting illicit activities across Bitcoin and Ethereum. Achieves F scores of 0.92-0.985 while maintaining full interpretability through SHAP, CIU and DEXiRE methods. GDPR and EU AI Act compliant. Built for fraud investigators, regulators and AML compliance teams.

MPMR-IMCP is a two-stage AI framework. It first uses a Vision Transformer to identify mucin expression from H&E whole slide images, then applies machine learning to integrate image features and clinical data for predicting intestinal metaplasia cancer risk.
A translation-aware framework for alignment-free phylogenetics using machine learning

This repository contains educational materials and code examples for learning TensorFlow, a popular open-source machine learning framework developed by Google. It provides hands-on examples covering fundamental machine learning concepts, TensorFlow basics, and core learning algorithms.
A machine learning and Monte Carlo framework for scenario-based geopolitical analysis

Petastorm library enables single machine or distributed training and evaluation of deep learning models from datasets in Apache Parquet format. It supports ML frameworks such as Tensorflow, Pytorch, and PySpark and can be used from pure Python code.
A machine learning framework for real-time OBD-II vehicle fault detection. Compares Random Forest, LightGBM, and Isolation Forest for high-accuracy, low-latency automotive diagnostics.
Machine learning and AI kernels implemented in various languages and frameworks

A machine learning-based system for detecting fraudulent financial transactions. This project analyzes transaction patterns, builds predictive models, and identifies anomalies with high accuracy while minimizing false positives, providing a research-driven framework for financial fraud detection

An open-source Python framework for hybrid quantum-classical machine learning.
A Machine Learning framework for predicting AFCON 2025 outcomes using dynamic Elo ratings, Gradient Boosting, and Poisson distribution simulations.

This repository provides a comprehensive framework for enhancing nuclear Density Functional Theory (DRHBc) predictions through physics-informed machine learning. Our approach combines -learning with domain-specific feature engineering to significantly improve the accuracy of nuclear binding energies, charge radii, and separation energy predictions
A machine learning framework template project for SUFE HPC.

A machine learningbased malware detection framework was developed to classify benign and malicious executables. Selected discriminative features were used to train multiple classifiers. Evaluation using accuracy and ROCAUC shows that ensemble models achieve superior detection performance.

Mapping Alternate Scenarios of Forest Intactness (MASFI) is a cloud-based machine learning framework. It uses XGBoost regression and remote sensing data such as GEDI LiDAR to create high-resolution maps and statistics, supporting protected area planning and management.
Bioinformatics-driven machine learning framework for prostate cancer risk stratification using gene expression data.

Developing an automated credit risk management framework, integrating high-performance machine learning and an algorithmic bias control mechanism.
A data-driven framework for optimizing low-Reynolds number UAV airfoils using a machine learning surrogate and a genetic algorithm.
a superresolution framework for CT images based on machine learning

A comprehensive machine learning system for predicting and preventing player churn in gaming applications. This end-to-end solution includes data pipelines, ML models, real-time APIs, interactive dashboards, and A/B testing frameworks.
Credit Scoring System using Django REST Framework and Machine Learning A backend API that predicts creditworthiness based on financial and personal attributes using a trained ML model.

A Machine Learning framework for discovering and characterizing scenarios from trajectory datasets into different interaction types by combining state-of-the-art trajectory forecasting and embedding quantization techniques.
Python SHIELD Machine Learning Framework - is a custom framework for AI/ML development compatible with Cuda, XPU and CPU. It also supports DDP.
lamp++ fast and lightweight machine learning framework in cpp, supporting tensors and autograd. includes implementations of basic neural networks

A machine learning framework that supports tensor operations, activations, layers, automatic differentiation, optimization training, among others. It is designed to provide a step by step guide on how to build an ML package similar to Pytorch and Tensorflow. Credit for this work goes to Harvard University through their open source courses

A platform developed from an open framework to help AI researchers and developers to rapidly prototype, test and deploy workflows that include machine learning models as worker components. The workflow can be invoked on command line or web service, as well as integrated into UX/UI as part of a larger intelligent solution.

SIGMA (Smart Intelligent Grid Management Architecture) .SIGMA is an AI framework designed to bring intelligence, resilience, and automation to modern power grids. This project integrates simulation data, machine learning models, and realtime monitoring pipelines to detect, classify, and respond to faults across multiple layers of the grid.
A machine learning framework using active learning strategies to accelerate the design of BCC solid solution high-entropy alloys
A Machine Learning framework written entirely in C language

A machine learningbased antenna design framework that predicts return loss (S11) from geometric parameters using an ensemble regressor. A genetic algorithm is used to optimize antenna dimensions across 5.56.5 GHz, reducing reliance on repeated EM simulations.
EARLY FAULT DETECTION AND ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS FOR MANUFACTURING SYSTEMS WITH A HYBRID MACHINE LEARNING FRAMEWORK
This demonstration of short-term stock price prediction aims to provide a clear predictive model within a machine learning framework.
Decentralized machine learning framework

This work presents a machine learning-based diagnostic system for automated kidney and liver disease analysis. Our approach leverages advanced ML algorithms to analyze clinical data, medical imaging, and laboratory results to provide early detection and accurate classification of kidney and liver pathologies.
ML.NET is an open source and cross-platform machine learning framework for .NET.

A novel machine learning framework integrating Grey Wolf Optimizer and XGBoost with constrained feature selection for enhanced Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) screening in children, emphasizing interpretability, efficiency, and suitability for resource-constrained environments.

Machine learning fundamentals implemented from scratch to study optimization, generalization, and model behavior. Built with NumPy to deeply understand gradient descent, backpropagation, and failure modes beyond black-box frameworks.
Audit AI models for fairness and explainability with VeritasAI, the ethical framework for responsible machine learning training and evaluation.
A minimal library for accessible Machine Learning workflows within the KDD framework. You can use a MLwrap tutorial at: https://psyarxiv.com/j6m4z

An AI-driven adaptive honeypot framework that dynamically deceives attackers, analyzes behavior using machine learning and reinforcement learning, and generates actionable threat intelligence mapped to the MITRE ATT&CK framework.

MOA is an open source framework for Big Data stream mining. It includes a collection of machine learning algorithms (classification, regression, clustering, outlier detection, concept drift detection and recommender systems) and tools for evaluation.
A framework for training and evaluating machine learning models on RF data.

Self-driving laboratory framework for autonomous drug discovery: closed-loop optimization, multi-instrument orchestration, ADMET prediction, and experimental design. Integrates robotics, analytics, and machine learning for hands-free pharmaceutical research workflows.

A Python-based framework for detecting anomalies in textual data using NLP, machine learning, and deep learning. A framework to evaluate Large Language Model (LLM) predictions, explanations, and counterfactuals against traditional Machine Learning models using clustering-based Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), baseline methods, and automated evaluation pipelines.

STAR-XPLAIN is an Explainable AI framework for interpretable analysis of astronomical light curves, combining classical machine learning, deep learning, and XAI methods to connect model predictions with physical astrophysical features.

This is my final year project where I use machine learning to predict the binding success rate between drug molecules and protein targets. I will code the frontend off of the react framework and use a REST API to connect it to the backend - Neural network, Database

A simulation-based project that implements a machine learningdriven fault detection and protection framework for a three-phase voltage source inverter using residual current analysis and real-time PWM shutdown logic.

This repository presents a machine learning and deep learningbased framework for the detection of schizophrenia using EEG signals. The project focuses on extracting meaningful neurophysiological biomarkers from multi-channel EEG data to distinguish schizophrenia patients from healthy control subjects.
Open-source machine learning framework for Java. Designed with speed and lightweight in mind.
